mapper.sql: id, contest_id, contest_group_id, open_id, type, create_time, mail_address, contestant_number, contestant_status, contestant_rank, contestant_achievement, contestant_award, status, contestant_real_name, contestant_ID_card, order_id, phone_number
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from cms_enrollment_record
order by ${orderByClause}

SELECT cms_enrollment_record.*, cms_contest.`name` AS contest_name, cms_contest.contest_time AS contest_time, cms_contest.logo AS logo, cms_contest_group.`name` AS group_name FROM cms_enrollment_record LEFT JOIN cms_contest ON cms_enrollment_record.contest_id = cms_contest.id LEFT JOIN cms_contest_group ON cms_enrollment_record.contest_group_id = cms_contest_group.id WHERE cms_enrollment_record.open_id = #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND cms_enrollment_record.status != 1 AND cms_enrollment_record.status != 2 ORDER BY id DESC
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into cms_enrollment_record (contest_id, contest_group_id, open_id, type, create_time, mail_address, contestant_number, contestant_status, contestant_rank, contestant_achievement, contestant_award, status, contestant_real_name, contestant_ID_card, order_id, phone_number) values (#{contestId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{contestGroupId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{mailAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contestantNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contestantStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contestantRank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contestantAchievement,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contestantAward,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{contestantRealName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contestantIdCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
